channel.title: Procedure RandomTab;
channel.description:
[scar]Procedure RandomTab; Begin Case (Random(7)+1) of 1:begin Mouse(560, 187,7,7,true) Wait(2000+Random(534)) If (not(FindDTM(Three,x,y,561, 361,637, 401)))then begin case Random(4)+1 of 1:begin Mouse(596, 286,5,5,true) end; 2:begin Mouse(595, 328,5,5,true) end; 3:begin Mouse(594, 366,5,5,true) end; 4:begin Mouse(594, 412,5,5,true) end; end; end; If FindDTM(Three,x,y,561, 361,637, 401) then begin Case Random(3)+1 of 1:begin Mouse(595, 289,5,5,true) end; 2:begin Mouse(590, 335,5,5,true) end; 3:begin Mouse(596, 383,5,5,true) end; end; end; end; 2:begin Mouse(584, 185,5,5,true) Wait(2000+Random(524)) Hoverskill('random',false) end; 3:begin Mouse(612, 185,6,6,true) Wait(3000+Random(345)) repeat ClickMouse(734, 446,true) T:=T+1 until T=(3+Random(3)) end; 4:begin Mouse(650, 187,5,5,true) Wait(2000+Random(782)) N:=0 Repeat N:=N+1 MMouseItem(N) Wait(3000+Random(500)) Until IsUpText('Eat') or IsUpText( 'Wield') or IsUpText ('Use') If IsUpText('Eat') or IsUpText( 'Wield') or IsUpText ('Use') then begin Getmousepos(x,y) Mouse(x,y,2,2,false) Wait(1000+Random(383)) Popup('examine') end; end; 5:begin Mouse(683, 187,5,5,true) Wait(1000+Random(514)) repeat ClickMouse(730,456,true) T:=T+1 until(T=(3+Random(3))) end; 6:begin Mouse(711, 183,5,5,true) Wait(1000+Random(300)) Case Random(9)+1 of 1:MMouse(631,230,3,3) 2:MMouse(715, 229,3,3) 3:MMouse(592, 261,3,3) 4:MMouse(672, 266,3,3) 5:MMouse(630, 299,3,3) 6:MMouse( 709, 298 ,3,3) 7:MMouse( 590, 338,3,3) 8:MMouse(670, 338,3,3) 9:MMouse( 637, 380,3,3) end; Wait(3000+Random(1549)) end; 7:begin Mouse(739, 189,6,6,true) Wait(500+Random(1784)) Case Random(10)+1 of 1:MMouse(589,227,2,2) 2:MMouse(637,328,2,2) 3:MMouse(610,371,2,2) 4:MMouse(709,277,2,2) 5:MMouse(586,301,2,2) 6:MMouse(588,374,2,2) 7:MMouse(655,257,2,2) 8:MMouse(684,226,2,2) 9:MMouse(588,249,2,2) 10:MMouse(683,299,2,2) end; Wait(3000+Random(1840)) end; end; end;[/scar]
May have a few bugs but its great =) Opens a random tab, hence the name, and then actuaytl DOES SOMETHING in that tab
Tab1: Comabt: Clicks a random combat style Tab2: Skills: Hovers over a random skill Tab3: Quests: Scolls down the quest list Tab4: Inventory: Finds any item and examines it Tab5: Equieped: Scrolls though stat bonuses Tab6: Prayers: Hovers over a random prayer Tab7: Magic Book: Hovers over a random spell
feedback welcome use it in ur scripts an antipan proc =) You can just put it in your main loop but you shoudl mke it like this begin Case Random(5) of 3: begin Randomtab end; end; end.
Otherwise it will check a randomtab once each loop which may be a little to much and may just slow down the rest of the script with random tab cheking =). But you can use it as many times as you want.
Just remember to cred meh! //BY YOHOHJO

item.title: Procedure RandomTab;
item.dc:creator: @junior junior
item.description:
@junior wrote:

I am using this in my script… But before i do, do you mind if i shorten it and take out a couple of the case randoms? And yes i am going to cred you, I am asking you this because I didnt want you thinking I would just take a procedure and make a couple of changes to it like like its mine.
~jR

item.title: Procedure RandomTab;
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

Try using ChooseOption, or PopUp. I’d recommend PopUp, all you need to do is this

PopUp(‘Whatever you want to choose’);

-Weibs.

Read full topic

item.title: Procedure RandomTab;
item.dc:creator: @yohojo yohojo
item.description:
@yohojo wrote:

[scar]Procedure RandomTab;
Begin
Case (Random(7)+1) of
1:begin
Mouse(560, 187,7,7,true)
Wait(2000+Random(534))
If (not(FindDTM(Three,x,y,561, 361,637, 401)))then
begin
case Random(4)+1 of
1:begin Mouse(596, 286,5,5,true) end;
2:begin Mouse(595, 328,5,5,true) end;
3:begin Mouse(594, 366,5,5,true) end;
4:begin Mouse(594, 412,5,5,true) end;
end;
end;
If FindDTM(Three,x,y,561, 361,637, 401) then
begin
Case Random(3)+1 of
1:begin Mouse(595, 289,5,5,true) end;
2:begin Mouse(590, 335,5,5,true) end;
3:begin Mouse(596, 383,5,5,true) end;
end;
end;
end;
2:begin
Mouse(584, 185,5,5,true)
Wait(2000+Random(524))
Hoverskill(‘random’,false)
end;
3:begin
Mouse(612, 185,6,6,true)
Wait(3000+Random(345))
repeat
ClickMouse(734, 446,true)
T:=T+1
until T=(3+Random(3))
end;
4:begin
Mouse(650, 187,5,5,true)
Wait(2000+Random(782))
N:=0
Repeat
N:=N+1
MMouseItem(N)
Wait(3000+Random(500))
Until IsUpText(‘Eat’) or IsUpText( ‘Wield’) or IsUpText (‘Use’)
If IsUpText(‘Eat’) or IsUpText( ‘Wield’) or IsUpText (‘Use’) then
begin
Getmousepos(x,y)
Mouse(x,y,2,2,false)
Wait(1000+Random(383))
Popup(‘examine’)
end;
end;
5:begin
Mouse(683, 187,5,5,true)
Wait(1000+Random(514))
repeat
ClickMouse(730,456,true)
T:=T+1
until(T=(3+Random(3)))
end;
6:begin
Mouse(711, 183,5,5,true)
Wait(1000+Random(300))
Case Random(9)+1 of
1:MMouse(631,230,3,3)
2:MMouse(715, 229,3,3)
3:MMouse(592, 261,3,3)
4:MMouse(672, 266,3,3)
5:MMouse(630, 299,3,3)
6:MMouse( 709, 298 ,3,3)
7:MMouse( 590, 338,3,3)
8:MMouse(670, 338,3,3)
9:MMouse( 637, 380,3,3)
end;
Wait(3000+Random(1549))
end;
7:begin
Mouse(739, 189,6,6,true)
Wait(500+Random(1784))
Case Random(10)+1 of
1:MMouse(589,227,2,2)
2:MMouse(637,328,2,2)
3:MMouse(610,371,2,2)
4:MMouse(709,277,2,2)
5:MMouse(586,301,2,2)
6:MMouse(588,374,2,2)
7:MMouse(655,257,2,2)
8:MMouse(684,226,2,2)
9:MMouse(588,249,2,2)
10:MMouse(683,299,2,2)
end;
Wait(3000+Random(1840))
end;
end;
end;[/scar]

May have a few bugs but its great =)
Opens a random tab, hence the name, and then actuaytl DOES SOMETHING in that tab

Tab1: Comabt: Clicks a random combat style
Tab2: Skills: Hovers over a random skill
Tab3: Quests: Scolls down the quest list
Tab4: Inventory: Finds any item and examines it
Tab5: Equieped: Scrolls though stat bonuses
Tab6: Prayers: Hovers over a random prayer
Tab7: Magic Book: Hovers over a random spell

feedback welcome
use it in ur scripts an antipan proc =)
You can just put it in your main loop but you shoudl mke it like this
begin
Case Random(5) of
3: begin Randomtab end;
end;
end.

Otherwise it will check a randomtab once each loop which may be a little to much and may just slow down the rest of the script with random tab cheking =). But you can use it as many times as you want.

Just remember to cred meh!
//BY YOHOHJO

Read full topic
